description: This table extracts the audit data from a Patient Location (PLC) record.

columns.name: LOCATION_EVNT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the location event.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: USER_EDIT_ID
columns.description: Item stores the user who made a specific modification to a patient location record.

columns.name: INST_OF_CHNG_TM
columns.description: Item tracks the instant a change was made to the patient location record.

columns.name: ITM_CHANGED
columns.description: Item that holds which patient location item was modified.

columns.name: OLD_VALUE
columns.description: Old value of item to be modified.  This is raw data, to get external data look at OLD_PLF_VALUE, OLD_STATUS_VALUE, OLD_EVENT_TYPE_VALUE, AND OLD_TIME_VALUE columns.

columns.name: NEW_VALUE
columns.description: New value of item that was modified.  This is raw data, to get external data look at NEW_PLF_VALUE, NEW_STATUS_VALUE, NEW_EVENT_TYPE_VALUE, AND NEW_TIME_VALUE columns.

columns.name: CHANGE_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Action that describes how a patient location record was changed.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Manual


Event Management


Admission


Transfer


Discharge


HOV


Update


Sign In


Check In


Check Out


Cancel Check In


Cancel Sign In


Interface


Undo Transfer


Undo Admission


Undo Discharge


Undo Manual Update


Undo HOV


Patient Merge


Patient Unmerge


Room Patient


Removed from Room


Patient Transport


Leave of Absence


Return from Leave of Absence


Undo Leave of Absence


Undo Return from Leave of Absence


RTLS Update


ED Waiting


Undo ED Arrival


Dismiss ED Encounter


Surrounding Event Edit

columns.name: OLD_PLF_VALUE
columns.description: If ITM_CHANGED is 215, then this column stores the old value of the patient location that was changed.

columns.name: NEW_PLF_VALUE
columns.description: If ITM_CHANGED is 215, then this column stores the new value of the patient location that was changed.

columns.name: OLD_STATUS_VALUE
columns.description: If ITM_CHANGED is 50, then this column stores the old value of the status that was changed.

columns.name: NEW_STATUS_VALUE
columns.description: If ITM_CHANGED is 50, then this column stores the new value of the status that was changed.

columns.name: OLD_EVENT_TYPE_VALUE
columns.description: If ITM_CHANGED is 70, then this column stores the old value of the event type that was changed.

columns.name: NEW_EVENT_TYPE_VALUE
columns.description: If ITM_CHANGED is 70, then this column stores the new value of the event type that was changed.

columns.name: OLD_TIME_VALUE
columns.description: If ITM_CHANGED is 221, 222, or 223, then this column stores the old value of the time that was changed.

columns.name: NEW_TIME_VALUE
columns.description: If ITM_CHANGED is 221, 222, or 223, then this column stores the new value of the time that was changed.
